DOC.detailed_description: Research Procedures : If patient choose take part research study , undergo research procedure : The patient participate total two meeting four phone call course study ( two half year ) . The meeting hold begin end two half year period . The first part meet take place Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center ( BIDMC ) sign consent form interview medical history , give physical examination , blood test describe . The patient transport Judge Baker Children 's Center ( JBCC ) , lunch , complete questionnaire , participate tap interview ( approximately 4 hour ) . The phone call approximately every six month patient contacted people JBCC . More detailed information study procedure outline JBCC consent form study . Interviews , Questionnaires , Phone call : These aspect study cover Judge Baker Children 's Center consent form . Briefly , patient ask discuss relationship partner , family , friend , career , current goal life , health status , etc . These session record patient 's answer cod analyze later time . All information keep strictly confidential . Medical Examination : The patient arrive fasting medical examination . During medical exam , physician ask patient question physical health family history . The doctor conduct physical examination include : 1 . Glucose finger stick diabetes screen 2 . Vital sign ( blood pressure ) anthropometrics ( waist circumference ) . 3 . Measuring amount fat patient 's body use bioelectrical impedance analysis . This test measure resistance naturally occur flow electrical current within nerve muscle use electrical sensor ( similar EKG ) attach patient 's wrist ankle less minute . This procedure painful use principle weigh oneself scale provide body mass index . 4 . Measuring patient body 's ability use sugar oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) . A nurse place intravenous ( IV ) catheter ( small tube ) patient 's arm . It tap stay place approximately four hour . The patient drink mixed nutrient drink call Boost . The patient 's blood drawn catheter 15 min Boost give 30-minute interval 3 hour measure metabolize nutrient drink . 5 . EKG
DOC.criteria: Male female participant 35 55 year age . ( base interference key assessment ) Abnormal hepatic function ( liver function test > 2X upper normal ) ; abnormal renal function ( creatinine > 1.3 mg/dl ) ; conditions/illnesses active infection , significant malabsorption/malnutrition , cancer ; active hormonal disease overt hypo/hyperthyroidism , hypogonadism , hypercortisolism , treatment steroid growth hormone . Known Diabetes Mellitus ( DM ) Cardiovascular Disease ( CVD ) screen detailed history system review . Baseline laboratory analysis chemistry , CBC , hormone level , EKG complete . Two exception make usual exclusion criterion : 1 . Original subject DM CVD exclude , since would result bias sample loss opportunity examine predictor associate outcomes . 2 . Community adult diagnose disorder screen visit retain referred medical treatment need . In group , DM and/or CVD follow psychosocial relevant biomedical variable , exclude assessment interfere CVD DM relevant medication . Those DM CVD time separately analyze , together participant develop disorder year new study phase .
